page.description: Return if an item exists in the dictionary.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = Exists as l(name as c)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The specified entry exists, .F. = The specified entry does not exist.

argument.name: name
argument.description: The key value of an entry in a StringDictionary list.

page.discussion: The .EXISTS() method determines whether a specified entry is in the StringDictionary list.
page.example: dim sd as StringDictionary sd.set("abc", "3") ? sd.exists("abc") = .T. sd.clear() ? sd.exists("abc") = .F.
